name: Sidak Singh
summary: Product Manager with over 8 years of experience, I bring a comprehensive skill set encompassing Product Management, Project Management, and Quality Assurance. My career is defined by my ability to lead and inspire teams, demonstrated by my successful leadership of a 50-member team through various complex projects. I thrive on transforming visionary ideas into tangible products, driving projects from concept to completion with a meticulous focus on quality and user satisfaction. My background in quality assurance ensures that every product I manage meets and exceeds industry standards. Throughout my career, I have developed a keen ability to align product strategy with business objectives, ensuring that every initiative drives growth and innovation. My collaborative approach fosters strong cross-functional relationships, enabling seamless project execution and continuous improvement.

education.institution: Beant College of Engg. & Tech., Gurdaspur

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: ML/AI/LLM-based e-commerce product built by 'Shorthills.ai', to simplify the shopping experience and save our customers time.
